title: Expedition Unknown: Hunt for the Yeti
overview: In Expedition Unknown: Hunt for the Yeti, join Josh Gates as he sets off on a quest to find the Yeti, a legendary man-ape living in the high altitude of the Himalayas. During this mother of all hunting expeditions, Josh meets with world-renowned researchers and daring explorers as he follows up on history's most credible accounts, gains access to ancient artifacts and investigates the most recent sightings of the so-called Abominable Snowman.
